effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 911,615 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 343,635.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

spells.description:
Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to summon Mister Pick-Me-Up for 6 sec, firing a healing beam every 2 sec that jumps between 5 injured allies to restore 113,169 health each.

Overhealing from this effect irradiates allies to deal Nature damage to nearby enemies over 1.5 sec, increased by additional overhealing.

Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,844 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 206 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
